author: Darren Lewis
title: West Ham, Stoke, Everton and Sunderland battling for Dynamo Kiev defender Domagoj Vida
text:
Sport West Ham, Stoke, Everton and Sunderland battling for Dynamo Kiev defender Domagoj Vida Sunderland have been tracking him for more than a year, but are bottom of the table and look set to miss out on the Croatia international Share Domagoj Vida of FC Dynamo Kyiv (Photo: 2016 Getty Images) Share Get football   Could   
Four Premier League clubs are in the hunt for Dynamo Kiev defender Domagoj Vida. 
West Ham, Stoke and Everton are battling Sunderland for the 27-year-old, who will have a year left on his contract in the summer. 
The four clubs are looking to strengthen in central defence, with West Ham also after a right-back and a striker when the transfer window reopens. 
Vida can play centre-back or either full-back position. 
Sunderland have been tracking him for more than a year, but are bottom of the table and look set to miss out on the Croatia international. Like us on Facebook
